amendment.description: To require a report on replacing U.S. troops with Iraqi forces or other non-U.S. forces in secure areas of Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1844 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1844 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S12590; text: CR S12590) To require a report on replacing U.S. troops with Iraqi forces or other non-U.S. forces in secure areas of Iraq.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1844 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1844 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer.
